H0.text: Flowers are what plants need to make their own food.

H1.text: Bacteria are needed by plants to make their own food.

H2.text: Sunlight is what plants need to make their own food.

H3.text: Oxygen is needed by plants to make their own food.

A4.text: Photosynthesis converts light energy, typically from sunlight, into chemical energy.

A5.text: Oxygen is a waste product of light-dependent reactions in photosynthesis.
